encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Oxyrhynchus in the Early Fourth Century: "Municipalization" and Prosperity. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: The article collects recent evidence for the role of the logistes (curator civitatis), illustrates the ways in which the administration of the metropolis was subjected to more systematic control, and considers whether the evidence for public expenditure is consistent with a scenario of "crisis and recovery".
